question.xref: DES s6, HC p102, KYTS p119
question.text: At traffic lights, amber on its own means

explanation.text: When amber is showing on its own red will appear next. The amber light means STOP, unless you have already crossed the stop line or you are so close to it that pulling up might cause a collision.

answer.text: go if the way is clear
go if no pedestrians are crossing
